name: KIM OCH MALIN OCH VALTER; SUPER SPELET; EN HISTORIA OM DEN INDUSTRIELLA R E V O L U T I O N E N
name_original: KIM OCH MALIN OCH VALTER; SUPER SPELET; EN HISTORIA OM DEN INDUSTRIELLA R E V O L U T I O N E N
description:
The year is 1750. 

A child with the oddest of powers is born into a simple farmers family. Instead of hands, one arm could spray streams of water. 

The other shot out beams of lightning. There was, however, one problem. If the two powers ever combined… Catastrophe would ensue. 

The child felt lost for many years, not being able to help out with the farming. But times were changing. Industries started to boom and the cities grew larger. Suddenly, a need to fix malfunctioning hardware became acute. 

He ventured into the city to finally find his purpose...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

A puzzle game that tests the players simultaneous capacity. Move one arm with your arrow keys and the other with WASD in order to solve endless, randomly generated levels.
